'''''Beyond the Aquila Rift''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Once, the Sacred Seat of Judgment}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement may be based on Alastair Reynolds' sci-fi anthology, ''{{w|Beyond the Aquila Rift}}''.
